mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (boardno, memberno, title, bcontent, rdate, board_cate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1) VALUES (board_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{title}, #{bcontent}, sysdate, #{board_cate}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1})
mapper.select: SELECT boardno, memberno, title, bcontent, rdate, board_cate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM board ORDER BY boardno DESC
SELECT boardno, memberno, title, bcontent, rdate, board_cate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM board WHERE boardno = #{boardno} ORDER BY boardno DESC

SELECT boardno, memberno, title, bcontent, rdate, board_cate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1 FROM board WHERE board_cate = #{board_cate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY boardno DESC OFFSET #{startRow} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE (#{board_cate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' OR board_cate = #{board_cate, jdbcType=VARCHAR})

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT boardno, memberno, title, bcontent, rdate, board_cate, LOWER(file1) AS file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY boardno DESC) AS rnum FROM board WHERE (#{board_cate, jdbcType=VARCHAR} = '' OR board_cate = #{board_cate, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
